headline: Albemarle's Q3 Earnings and Sales Miss on Lower Lithium Pricing
summary: Lower lithium market prices weigh on ALB's Q3 results, partly masked by volume growth and cost and productivity benefits.

headline: Albemarle: Don't Lose Faith Now
summary: Albemarle is adjusting its business model due to slow EV demand, leading to reduced lithium mine construction. Learn more about ALB stock here.

headline: Albemarle Adjusts To Lower-For-Longer Lithium Prices, Cuts Capex, Announces Layoffs
summary: Albemarle Corporation (NYSE:ALB), the world's leading lithium producer, reported a challenging third quarter, revealing a net loss of $1.1b amidst a continued downturn in lithium prices. Despite a market slump, fueled by a supply surplus from China and a demand-dampening slower EV adoption – Albemarle saw a 16% rise in lithium sales volume year-over-year. Management expects the downturn to endure, so it has announced measures to adjust to these market conditions: streamlining business units and
